name: francoisjacquet/rosariosis
description: Student Information System for school management

suggest.ext-pgsql: RosarioSIS relies on the pgsql extension (used to connect to the PostgreSQL database).
suggest.ext-mysqli: RosarioSIS relies on the mysql (or mysqli) extension (used to connect to the MySQL database).
suggest.ext-pdo: RosarioSIS relies on the pdo extension (used for prepared SQL statements).
suggest.ext-mbstring: RosarioSIS relies on the mbstring extension (used for multibyte strings).
suggest.ext-gettext: RosarioSIS relies on the gettext extension (used for translations).
suggest.ext-intl: RosarioSIS relies on the intl extension (used for internationalization).
suggest.ext-zip: RosarioSIS relies on the zip extension (used to upload add-ons).
suggest.ext-curl: RosarioSIS relies on the curl extension (used to make external API calls).
suggest.ext-gd: RosarioSIS relies on the gd extension (used to resize and compress images).

suggest.wkhtmltopdf/wkhtmltopdf: RosarioSIS relies on wkhtmltopdf to generate PDF reports.
suggest.kornelski/pngquant: RosarioSIS relies on PNGQuant to compress PNG images.
